alert.note: Alert for Alaska Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 3:58PM AKDT until March 18 at 8:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Visibilities reduced to one half mile or less at times. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Alaska Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 8 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers, heavy at times, will persist over the next several days. Visibility will fluctuate up and down over short periods of time due to variability in shower and wind intensity.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
